name: offirmo-monorepo
description: A monorepo for all my JavaScript / TypeScript personal projects. So convenient!
author: Offirmo <offirmo.net@gmail.com>

COMMENTS.01: dependencies: Netlify build only installs PROD dependencies, so make sure modules critical for scripts are included!

scripts.heroku-prebuild: echo This runs before Heroku nodjs buildback installs dependencies. Ensuring monorepo setup... && pwd && test -f Procfile
scripts.heroku-postbuild: echo This runs after Heroku installs dependencies, but before Heroku prunes and caches dependencies. && pwd && ls -l
scripts.clean--root: rm -rf node_modules .npm npm-debug.log package-lock.json yarn.lock yarn-error.log .yalc .awcache .parcel .parcel-cache bower_components typings
